data.description: Draw SVG pictures in MATLAB style.
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
"SVGLAB" means : draw SVG pictures like MATLAB style. It draws SVG
    in a simple style, and is totally different from the exist "SVG.pm".
    This module can draw complex pictures using simple commands. And
    maybe simple 3D pictures is possible in the future version.
